ValidationRule.description: Publishing End Date should be greater than Publishing Start Date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(QUT_Giving_Publish_End_Date__c) ), NOT(ISBLANK(QUT_Giving_Publish_End_Date__c)), QUT_Giving_Publish_End_Date__c <= QUT_Giving_Publish_Start_Date__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Publishing End Date should be greater than Publishing Start Date.
